Create a 1/1 red Parasite creature token with haste and “This creature can’t block”. Populate. [i](Create a token that’s a copy of a creature token you control.)[/i]
[i]Otherworld[/i] – As long as an opponent has been burdened three or more times and this card is in your graveyard, it has flashback {2}{G}. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
